title: facade
desc: Facade is a library of helper functions that makes reading and writing Segment integration code delightful.
content:
As you might guess, functions such as `track.event()`, `track.properties()`, and `track.userId()` are all Facade functions. The names of the functions allow you to quickly understand what pieces of data we are mapping for a given integration.

Every `Integration` object's `prototype` is extended with Facade functions, meaning that you'll be able to use the Facade across all of our other various types of messages such as `.page()`, `.group()`, `.identify()`, etc.

Understanding the full potential of the facade will elevate your techinical knowledge of our integration code tremendously!
